headlines.description: Two goals within 61 seconds spurred Brentford to a 3-0 Premier League victory over Southampton on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brentford ease to win over dismal Southampton

headlines.description: A resurgent Aston Villa beat Burnley 3-1 at Turf Moor in the Premier League on Saturday, halting the home side's mini-revival.
headlines.shortLinkText: Burnley relegation fears grow after loss to Villa

headlines.description: Conor Coady scored a last-minute header to help Wolverhampton Wanderers to a 2-2 draw against Chelsea at Stamford Bridge on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea let two-goal slip in costly draw to Wolves

headlines.description: — Watford became the second team to be relegated from the English Premier League after losing at Crystal Palace 1-0 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hodgson's Watford relegated after losing at Crystal Palace

events.name: Manchester United at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Brighton & Hove Albion thrashed a woeful Manchester United 4-0 at the Amex Stadium on Saturday in their first home victory since Boxing Day.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dismal Man United concede four at Brighton

headlines.description: Liverpool suffered a blow to their Premier League title hopes after a 1-1 draw with Champions League-chasing Tottenham at Anfield on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool suffer title blow with Spurs draw
